import React ,{useContext , useState} from 'react' import { GlobalState } from '../../GlobalState' function FilterOffer() { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [offer , setOffer] = state.offersApi.offers const [pays , setpays]= state.offersApi.pays const [sort , setSort]= state.offersApi.sort const [search , setSearch]= state.offersApi.search return (
setSearch(e.target.value.toLowerCase())} className='input_search'>
) } export default FilterOffer
